phrases: From: Yukika-chan Yamato-san, Thank you for your help yesterday.
Thanks to you and Takeo-kun, I was able to invite Sunakawa-kun to the zoo.
Thank you for listening to me.
I am in the city, trying to buy some clothes,
but I am having trouble picking them.
If you happen to be free,
would it be possible for you to help me?
Yukika-chan, sorry to keep you waiting!
You are going on a date.
Of course you would want to get ready!
But I do not know what kind of clothes to wear.
You want him to think you look cute!
With any luck, I hope he will like me!
But I have no idea what kind of clothes I should wear,
so that he will like me...
What kind of clothes does Sunakawa-kun like girls to wear?
Suna, what kind of clothes do you like on girls?
What kind of question is that?
Maybe this fits the zoo theme?
Oh come on, Maybe this fits the zoo theme?
anything normal is fine, if it suits the person.
Wow these shoes have really high heels!
Wow these shoes have really high heels!
No, they can be Western clothes.
If we are talking clothes that suit anyone...
I am sure he means wear anything, really...
She froze when she saw Suna!
Seeing him up close, she must be feeling overwhelmed and paralyzed.
What is the point of asking him out if you will not talk, Yukika-chan?
Let us go to the zoo!
The reason I picked the zoo is...
During an elementary school field trip,
Sunakawa-kun asked why we call the giraffe kirin.
No one knew the answer, so that ended it then,
I really wanted to tell him
it was because it is named after a mythical beast in China.
But I just did not have the courage to tell him.
That is why I wanted to make some good memories at the zoo today.
I think having Sunakawa-kun save me from the ball in dodgeball
It means the best time of your life.
The Best Time of Your Life
Where do you want to go afterward?
Let us just follow the route.
Yamato, you remind me of a cute critter.
I guess I am small, but maybe I am a carnivore.
Oh, that one reminds me of Yukika-chan.
If that is what you think, I guess that is fine.
I am sorry I took it the wrong way at first.
The gorilla reminds me of you, Takeo-kun.
You do not always hold back, huh?
Maybe, but I would not stand a chance against him...
I think he is really strong.
I am happy just to get out of the rain for a bit...
Yukika-chan, you will not make any memories with him this way.
It will be like elementary school.
Now that I am thinking you look like him,
Takeo-kun, I am starting to really like gorillas!
Th-There is not a postcard of the bird you really liked.
It did not seem that popular.
I guess there would not be one.
I managed to talk to him!
There will be a trivia competition in front of Monkey Mountain.
Would you like to go see?
We will now begin the trivia competition.
If you would like to join, please form pairs.
Can the pairs join hands, so that we know how many there are?
I should have paired up with Suna!
You can let go of each other's hand now!
Here is the first question, then.
in order to absorb UV rays.
Q3: Rhinoceros horns are she would and regrown every year.
Q4: The Japanese serow is not in the same family as the deer.
Now we only have two pairs, so here is the final question.
The first pair to answer correctly will win.
Which zebra is at this zoo?
Is it the mountain zebra, the plains zebra, or the Grevy's zebra?
If there is anything to read lying around, I find myself reading...
You used to read a lot in kindergarten, too.
I will go walk Yamato home.
I had not been for a while.
I was all nervous for you, too
I am so happy for you!
Do not worry, it was not a dream!
It is because you summoned the courage.
Today was the happiest day of my life.
I talked about small things with Sunakawa-kun today.
I have always wanted to be that way with him.
That might be the happiest thing ever.
He is a very kind person.
He came to the zoo because he is kind.
He smiled because he is kind.
I do not think Sunakawa-kun dislikes me.
But it does not mean he likes me, you know?
No, it is not that I do not like her.
If I did not want to, I would not go.
I knew I felt something off.
So that is what it was.
He does not not like her, but he does not like her, either.
At night and stuff, I wonder what Sunakawa-kun might be doing.
Sometimes, I want to see him.
I wonder if we might randomly run into each other.
I do not think Sunakawa-kun thinks that way about me.
You can tell these things, you know?
I see, you do not know.
How we feel about each other is so different
I am going to give up.
I should not have told him how I felt.
Not disliking someone is different than liking someone.
I do not sense Yukika-chan anymore...
I got a text message from Yukika-chan.
I will never forget how you helped me pick out clothes.
I do not think we will be seeing each other again.
May you be happy with Takeo-kun.
I replied to her text, but she has not written back.
She will not even answer my calls!
She said that it was getting painful, how kind Suna was to her.
That she was heartbroken because they felt so differently about each other.
She said she was going to give up.
She asked me to thank you for everything.
I am going to stop by the bookstore.
So this is how it ends.
It is kind of sad that it just faded out like that.
Yukika-chan was saying that she wished she would never said anything.
If she thought about it more,
she would remember there were some fun times, too!
Do not say sad things like you wish you would never said anything,
She is headed for the park!
You do not have to disappear from all of our lives, Yukika
What is there to do now?
Suna might only be nice to you now,
but are not you just getting started?
How can I keep talking to him,
when I know he does not have feelings for me?
I am not tough like you!
I have seen the letter you left for Suna with his chocolate, back in kindergarten!
I was really impressed when I saw the letter!
This must be how it is when someone really likes you!
That is why even Suna still remembers the letter.
I do not think he is nice to just anyone.
It is too sad to have things end this way!
What are you doing in front of the ladies' room?
We are discussing an important issue!
He is a friend of mine!
Oh, next time, try not to act so suspicious.
it would be sad if I never spoke to Sunakawa-kun again...
He says he wants to meet with me.
I will go meet with him!
I wonder what Sunakawa-kun's going to do.
I do not know, but Suna is kind...
I am sorry for asking you to come see me.
Thank you for all the chocolates.
I have always wanted to thank you for them.
Thank you for being so nice to me.
If I see you at school, can we still talk like friends?
This is exactly the kind of thing I like.
He said this was for all ten years of giving him chocolate.
Talking to Takeo-kun and Yamato-san until late at night.
though I could not talk to him at all...
Going to the zoo with Sunakawa-kun,
though I could not talk to him at all...
Still, I have a lot of happy memories!
I am glad I told him how I felt!
I wanted to be like you, Takeo-kun.
When he is with you, Sunakawa-kun laughs out loud.
I like how he laughs when he is with you the most.
But I cannot just jump into a river like you...
I cannot write letters like you, either.
Though in a completely different way from how I like Sunakawa-kun, of course.
Were you able to tell Suna everything you wanted to?
I do not need anything in return, so please like me.
I have been telling him for the last ten years.
I do not need anything in return,
so I want him to like me.
But I guess that was the most difficult thing to ask.
If someone you like returns the feeling, you do not need anything.
I want Sunakawa-kun to date a really nice girl,
who is really kind and cute, and likes Sunakawa-kun even more than I do!
I want Sunakawa-kun to like someone and to date that person!
I will walk home with Yukika-chan.
I am sorry I took it the wrong way at first.
When she apologized to you at the zoo,
I thought she was a nice person.
I still do not get it
I hope you find someone you like!
Well, I am having a great enough time as is.
Sometimes, you end up in tears after liking someone.
The bird's name is the Bali myna.
But liking someone is still a good thing.
